website_summaries.verdict: A stylish twin comforter set that comes with everything you need to dress up your bed straight out of the bag. Fashionable and functional.
pros: Comfy and soft to the touch
Lightweight and breathable, yet fluffy and warm
Baffle-box stitching has a classic appeal and effectively keeps fill from shifting
Set includes comforter, pillow case, sham, sheets, and a bed skirt
Available in 2 prints and a wide variety of colors
cons: Prints aren't quite as prominent as pictured

customer_reviews.title: This photo is the product straight out of the package
customer_reviews.text: The quality and fit are excellent for the price, but as you can see on the photo, The dobby stripes are nowhere near as prominent (almost unnoticeable from a few feet away) as they are in the advertisement, and they're going in a horizontal direction. Keep that in mind, especially if you're ocd like me. Still, not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Art V.

customer_reviews.title: Won’t fit a queen bed
customer_reviews.text: Unless you’re sleeping on a prison mattress, there’s no way this is going to fit a queen bed like it shows in the picture. It will fit nice on one side and barely cover the other side. I can’t comment on the sheets or skirt as I never got past how small the comforter was. I can’t return this item fast enough. You’ve been warned.
customer_reviews.author: disgruntled

customer_reviews.title: i have never been so disappointed with an order
customer_reviews.text: i have never been so disappointed with an order. The comforter seem to be the size of a full bed. the sheets both fitted and flat are for a king size bed. The pillow cases are for a king or large pillows. we are extremely busy older people who currently are dealing with lots of doctor appointments and other activities of daily life. how is it possible to have packaged such a miss match of items and send it out as if its ok. its NOT We are unhappy and disappointed to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: James Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Queen-size Bed set with sheets
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was a super deal. I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of the comforter as well as the bed skirt, sheets, pillowcases and pillow shams. The navy blue is a rich, deep color and is spectacular with red sheets as well as the ones that came with the 8-piece collection. We put 2 accent pillows with cream backgrounds and shades of navy and med. blue in front of the pillow shams and it topped off the perfect look. This was a gift for a couple in my family and they are tickled with the quality, feel and look.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Beth

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: I haven't even opened it yet and put it onto my bed. Firstly, the top half of my picture is the color advertised, the bottom half is the actual color that came. It's not just a shade or two off, they are two completely different colors. Secondly, the stripes that are advertised are barely noticable on the set I recieved. Highly disappointed with the look. Will update this review later if I decide I will actually try them.
customer_reviews.author: Carlee

customer_reviews.title: The comforter is ok, but the sheets are so ...
customer_reviews.text: The comforter is ok, but the sheets are so cheap you can see through them and will not stay on the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Dena

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit properly
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a queen size but it was the size of a king so I returned it and reordered a queen. Second one was also not a queen. The sheets were poor qualityand the dust ruffle was ripped. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Moe Reen

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made- comforter has a hole in it.
customer_reviews.text: There's a golf-ball sized hole in the seam of the blanket & the stuffing is visible. I just wasted 30 minutes getting the bedskirt on the box spring and sheets on the bed, only to discover the hole in the comforter. This is unacceptable and I have requested a refund as opposed to a replacement, due to the cheap quality.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Best bedset I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: When I first moved into my new home, I wanted to purchase a good quality bed set, but something that was affordable. I found this, and ordered right away. The comforter is SOO soft, and not too heavy. The sheets are silky and soft, and I wash my bedding twice a week and have already washed this bed set about 10 times and it holds up so well. As a housewarming gift I received a $200 bed in a bag, and was excited to put it on my bed, but within two days took it off and switched back to this one, it seriously is that good! Goes to show that more expensive doesn't always mean better!
customer_reviews.author: Irene Melovidov

customer_reviews.title: VERY Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This set was a HUGE surprise as I wasn't expecting the quality I received. Honestly I thought this was going to be equivilant to one of those cheapy Walmart brand bed-in-bag numbers but it far exceeded that. The spread is has some weight to it and the set comes with everything but the bed. This set was a pleasant discovery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not this time
customer_reviews.text: Very short comforter. I got the king size hoping that the comforter would be a little longer on my queen bed but not. I like the spread to come up to at least to the middle of the side of bed. Also for some reason when i washed it i ended up with a dark stain on the spread only. Nothing in washer or dryer. Not sure it it came that way or if washing did something.
customer_reviews.author: M. Giorgi

customer_reviews.title: The plastic changes the color
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Dobby Sage Green and was a little concerned that it was not as green as the picture due to other reviews. When it came in, the picture on the package and the color showing were definitely not the same. However, the bed set is for our 18 year old son and he’s not picky. So we took it out and the whole thing is vacuum packed into plastic. Once removing the plastic, I found that the color was a very pretty green and was very surprised by how much the plastic had changed the color. It’s soft and perfect what we need it for.
customer_reviews.author: Kitteekait

customer_reviews.title: Pockets in the sheets.
customer_reviews.text: We needed a new set quickly for our guest room and I didn't want to pay a large sum of money. This worked for what we needed. The pillow cases are a bit tight and I'm not sure they used material from the same dye lot. I was surprised to find pockets on the fitted sheets. I guess those are for your cell phones in case you don't have a night stand or something else close by.
customer_reviews.author: S. Woodman

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is incorrect
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE - the size listed for the King Ocean Blue Vine comforter is INCORRECT. It is listed at 102x88 inches, but the size on the packaging that came was 100x86 inches and the size on the tag is 101x86 inches. While that might not seem like a large difference, I would not have bought this comforter as I wanted something slightly bigger than what I had (88x94) in both directions. Apparently you cannot trust the information given. And the comforter is small too - we have a queen size bed and the king barely fits.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Way better than expected. Very light and comfortable. I was a bit worried about the negative reviews but I'm glad I gave it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Q

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: It was cheap, so I wasn't expecting very much. The sheets are very thin and the corner elastic feels like it will only last a few washings before coming apart. One of the pillow cases was not stitched on one side of the open end, and the two pillow shams were from two different dye lots and are different.
customer_reviews.author: legalois

customer_reviews.title: Nice cooling material
customer_reviews.text: The material is great and easy to clean and maintain. However, the sizes are pretty off, mattress cover is off for king or cal king, just a bit too large, looks like they where not familiar what size and just made it 10% larger, which is ok, but if you have a CG base the sheet will get off after a couple days and you have to re-adjust. Pillow covers are gigantically large. After 3 washes is grays a bit which is expected with a black color. All in all good material, nice design and color.
customer_reviews.author: Los Angelinos

customer_reviews.title: The comforter is a nice weight, and generously sized to cover an 11" ...
customer_reviews.text: A pleasant surprise. The comforter is a nice weight, and generously sized to cover an 11" mattress. The fabric is very soft, not sure it would hold up well with daily use but I'm using it in my guest room which is used occasionally. Sheets were washed before putting on the bed...and they washed well. Because of the softness of the fabric, the shams seems a bit flimsy but not an issue for me.
customer_reviews.author: LEJ

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the color does not match as advertised. Mine came with the zipper open and the sheets had mildewed. The green is almost brown and you can barely see the stripes. I washed it before butting it on the bed and the skirt literally came apart. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Rose Barrere

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding value and quality!
customer_reviews.text: It's so soft and comfortable, I don't want to get out of bed in the morning! It's warm without being hot, the sheets are very nice and cool, everything is stitched very well - without a doubt, I am more than satisfied with everything - the price, the quickness of the shipment, the quality of the materials and the look of the entire package!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Austin

customer_reviews.title: love my new bedding
customer_reviews.text: love that the sheets are so soft and comfy. I have kind of an unusual circumstance. I bought this set for my spare room (double bed), but mistakenly ordered the "queen" (our bed is a queen). So, instead of returning it, I am using the comforter and shams on the double bed and the dust ruffle actually fits too, and the sheets on our bed. I figured it was easier to just get another set of sheets for the double. The only thing that disappoints me slightly, is that there are little nubby fuzz balls on the sheets at the bottom now after being washed twice.
customer_reviews.author: Patti McKelvey

customer_reviews.title: Used! With dog hair included!
customer_reviews.text: I just opened this set to find that it is covered in dog hair! The comforter has obviously been washed before as it has a worn look to it. I’m very disappointed. I wasn’t expecting to receive a used bedding set. Super nasty...
customer_reviews.author: sarah flores

customer_reviews.title: Soft, awesome, just don’t get White!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s really soft... but came with stains on it. I’m going to try really hard to get them out in the wash. It looks pretty cheaply made. I could’ve got a nicer one I think for the money unfortunately. The stitching looks done really fast. I probably will just buy a duvet cover to go over it so I didn’t get a total loss. Besides that, it’s soft and looks pretty elegant. I would just recommend not getting white and you should be very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit like the picture shows
customer_reviews.text: The comforter in the picture must have been a king size on a full size bed, the comforter barely fits our king size bed the dimensions in the description are accurate if you stretch it out to the extreme, and the fitted sheets will not stay put and are extremely thin, if the comforter was bigger I would be happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas E.

customer_reviews.title: Measurements Are Off
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this bed in a bag set zero stars I would!! The comforter for the queen size bed is way too small and does not cover the bed properly. Also the measurements for the pillowcases and shams are completely off and are way too big for 20x26 and 20x30 pillows. It will be too much of a hassle to try to return, so I will simply throw the whole set out. However, I DO NOT like wasting my money and I definitely DO NOT RECOMMEND this set!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Buy
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for bedding for a queen sized bed that I will only be using for about 6 months. So I didn't want to pay a lot and figured I'd just be settling for something that gets me by. This set greatly exceeded my expectations, though. Very soft, comfortable material and also very attractive. I'm extremely impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Wife liked it but once we received it
customer_reviews.text: Wife liked it but once we received it, we realized material for spread was not very soft, but we chose to use their sheet and pillow case set and pull this off at night and put a regular warm blanket on that is soft. Quality is not the issue, just material is not that great.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Horrible. Product sent is different than the one advertised
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Product sent is different than the one advertised. The comforter itself is too short, barely covers the end of the bed and you can see the sheet underneath of it. I measured the comforter that was sent and it is several inches shorter than what the manufacturer claims. What a disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: J. Long

customer_reviews.title: Pretty alright
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our new bed and really looking forward to it. It looks great but is not nearly as soft as we had hoped. Also, the fitted sheet seems to slip off more than previous sheets, but that is probably something to do with variance in heights. Overall happy, but not thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan D

customer_reviews.title: Nice, good price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bedding set as my current sheets are in storage after a cross country move. The sheets are very soft and light weight, however they are thin and not the highest quality. Considering the price I was not disappointed by this because I was looking for something cheap but nice. I would definitely buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Jaydan

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed with this product
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with this product. The comforter was very thin and felt cheap. It is necessary to buy the bigger size since it is small. I ordered Queen for my Queen size bed and it barely covered my mattress. I returned the item and would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: **Soft & Cozy but Too Tiny**  (that's what she said!:)
customer_reviews.text: This set is very soft and cozy!! My only complaint is it isn't as long as advertised on the picture. I put this set on a regular Queen size bed and the skirt doesn't touch the ground and the comforter barely drapes over the edge of the matress. But like i said, it really is soft and cozy just wish it was bigger!
customer_reviews.author: TaylorRenee

customer_reviews.title: Cheap ... is cheap
customer_reviews.text: I realize this was an extremely low priced item, and usually you get what you pay for. The bed coverings etc. seem to be ok, although I'm not sure how long they will last because everything is made out of a super thin material. Especially the bed skirt is so flimsy I was afraid I might tear it while handling it when putting it on the bed. It almost seems to be made out of paper?
customer_reviews.author: Tobias Thijs Engel

customer_reviews.title: good sage comforter
customer_reviews.text: I love that it is soft smooth all in one. The material is thin. It could be a little wider. For the price it is fine. The color I got the sage is right on point it matches my bedroom items.
customer_reviews.author: Pounceybuy73

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this bedding set. We have two dogs so I was worried the dark blue would show a ton of hair because our previous set did. But nope, the hair brushes right off super easily, The sheets are soft, have a bit of a shine to them. I absolutley love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap quality, different as pictured, stripes thinner. I returned it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Pilatesgirl2

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love ny product ; it was better than I expected due to the reviews i read i thought was going to be horrible but i love it . I have a queen bed but order a king set and fits perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Keke Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Very Displeased
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my parents and when it came, I could tell it was made cheap. It’s listed as “100% microfiber” but the tag says “100% polyester” which was the first thing I noticed. It feels cheap and there are strings everywhere. It’s also a lot darker than the photo provided. I was expecting it to brighten up the room, but it makes yet feel much darker. Also, I bought the queen size and it barely hangs over the edges. It looks nothing like the photo. Half the mattress is exposed. Very displeased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jacob

customer_reviews.title: I hate the sheet set and dust ruffle the only good ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know who;s packing, but I know it's not right the sheet set is not queen it's a king size set ,the dust ruffle is also a king and the pillow shams, the stripes on the sheet set is not the same as on the comforter ,I hate the sheet set and dust ruffle the only good thing in the set is the comforter ,Please if you sell items make sure people get the items that you have in the picture check them before you ship them out we will be much happier.
customer_reviews.author: Rhetta Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: the material is very soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: The set is not as dark as it is shown in the picture and you can barely see the stripes. The set is small. The comforter is small, the pillow cases are small and very thin. However, the material is very soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Zimmer

customer_reviews.title: the sheets were the only thing that i really like. the comforter is very small for a "queen ...
customer_reviews.text: the sheets were the only thing that i really like. the comforter is very small for a "queen size" barely covers over the edges of the bed. and does not look like the picture at all. Its not "Overfilled for maximum comfort" as it says and comes in a very light color gray not this nice dark grey as i really wanted. Im not happy about this purchase. I would send back for a second time but I have guest coming up this weekend and have no other bedding for our spare room. The first time they sent me a twin size when i ordered a queen set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap thin material
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited to get this...then went to pull it over my bed and my finger went through the material. Not impressed with the quality at all.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: The color is lighter than in the photo which was fine. Very soft and pretty. Just poor quality. After one wash and one night sleep the seam on one pillow case has split. Also the inside of comforter was piling inside on the corners.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Murphree

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: The sheets are a little big but it’s in my guest room and frankly if a guest is going to complain they can go up the road to the holiday inn
customer_reviews.author: Prime Time

customer_reviews.title: Returned promptly
customer_reviews.text: I returned this. It was NOT the color or quality purchased. It looked olive green rather than the dark gray I expected. It was also cheaply made. I was sorely disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: P. Todd

customer_reviews.title: Love the comforter, the rest is cheap
customer_reviews.text: I wish this didn’t come as a set. The comforter is soft, plush, and very comfortable. The rest of the set is very flimsy and cheap. One of the pillow cases tore overnight, the bed skirt is super thin and oversized. The fitted sheet does not fit snugly.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Don't be blindsided when needing to be on budget. SUCK IT UP. DO WITHOUT OR SPEND MORE
customer_reviews.text: it an inferior made product, but for price, what coulI expect. perfect color, matches quality sheets I have. JUST EXPECTED FILLING TO AT LEAST REACH ENDS OF COMFORTER. GHASTLY LOKKING WORKMANSHIP. WHY BOTHER TO MANUFACTURE HALF DONE PROJECT? FELT IT WOULD BE "Backup linens". WILL NOT SURVIVE WASHING MACHINE, THIS COMMON LOGIC MUST BE APPLIED. BUT TO SEND TO DRY CLEANERS WHICH WILL BE MORE THAN COST? not that braindead; although falling for this may prove I may be lacking common sense, A MOST GORGEOUS COLOR AND FABRIC!!!
customer_reviews.author: K.K.

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly soft and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: The sheets are amazing, so soft and comfortable. The comforter is heavy enough to encourage sleep but lightweight enough not cause over heating. This is a great deal!! It has only been washed once but it held up well in the washer!
customer_reviews.author: Boom fish

customer_reviews.title: Great price for Comforter
customer_reviews.text: Works great! It fits well and looks just like picture. Its a good price for the comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Envy Geralds

customer_reviews.title: Nice and great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This comforter set was exactly perfect for me. It looks perfect in my bedroom. It was 62 bucks for the king size which is a really great price for it. It fits, the sheets are soft and the comforter is nice. It's not a heavy comforter because again, 62 bucks but I didn't need a heavy comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the collection
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in the collection. The stripes are horizontal on the sheets and the comforter. I thought they would be vertical. Also the comforter is very very small for a queen size bed. This comforter would fit better on a regular double bed. Sheets are made of very thin material as well. I would recommend spending more and getting a better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed when the fitted sheet did not fit and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed when the fitted sheet did not fit and the comforter was a little short I would not recommend this item
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Used this for my queen bed. I’ve been using it for less than a week and already the thread on the comforter is coming undone. I get tangled up in it when I sleep and it’s VERY annoying. I obviously ordered the queen set for my queen bed and the fitted sheet is way too big, it slides all over the place and pops off of the corner when I haven’t fixed for the fourth time in a day. Def wouldn’t buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Christy C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product so far
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a couple months now and I have thoroughly enjoyed them.
customer_reviews.author: JJ Janca

customer_reviews.title: Garbage. Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: These were constructed out of very cheap material. Garbage. Do not waste your money. I want a refund.
customer_reviews.author: HAL-9000

customer_reviews.title: Value is great
customer_reviews.text: According to the picture and description, I thought it was supposed to be Sage green which is lighter. But I got army green instead. Luckily it matches my bedroom. But it’s a very nice and comfortable set
customer_reviews.author: David A Rice

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice all in one bedding set. Several colors to choose from. The set we purchased came exactly as pictured, very soft and lightweight. I’ve only had the set for about 6 weeks, but they seem durable and are easy to wash at home.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick Ferrigno

customer_reviews.title: It looks nothing like the blanket in the photo.
customer_reviews.text: It’s extremely light and maybe it will fluff up once it has had time to be out of the package. The color is really nice but it doesn’t look anything like the photo. The blanket in the photo is not the blanket that you get. When I have time I will take a photo once I put it on the bed, maybe it will look better. It looks like it came from a garage sale for $1.00 it’s very thin and Walmart’s bed in a bag for $40 is better quality. I’m shocked it looks nothing like the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle C. Lehman

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is very picky about materials and she absolutely loved this set. It had everything included in the bag. We see very happy with this buy. The sheets are very soft and the comforter is very warm.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Overall Good Comforter Set
customer_reviews.text: This comforter set is overall good, I'd say that the pictures are depicted accurately on what you receive. The quality of the material itself is good, not thin or scrunchy, so seems like it can undergo many washes and not lose color or fade. Lastly, the packing was very good as the entire set was in a soft plastic case shipped and shipped in a large, typical, Amazon box.
customer_reviews.author: Jason L.

customer_reviews.title: This bed set is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I like the color of the bed set because it matches the color of my room. The bed set is smooth and very comfortable to sleep on. The sheets are very strong and don't rip easily.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Description and picture of product do not match
customer_reviews.text: This product does not match the description. The picture shows a deep grey with pen stripes. What I received was a greenish Grey and you couldn’t see the pen stripes. Very disappointed! I should have read the reviews before ordering. This item was returned.
customer_reviews.author: Matt S.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't wear good
customer_reviews.text: It's not the comfort or feel of this comforter.after the 2nd wash....the stuffing starts to lump up in random spots all over it.looks horrible. Opposite of the clean cut look in pic
customer_reviews.author: Amber Haney Glasgow

customer_reviews.title: Quality and price
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, I am very impressed. Good quality and a good price. Can’t beat that. I thought I’d post the first picture for you guys to see.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Salmeron

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love this set and the price. I ordered the Queen pale pink and it’s exactly how it looks in the picture. I will be ordering more in the future. Sorry for the mess my puppy loves playing with the pillows and hiding in the comforter with her toys. Lol
customer_reviews.author: EyEy

customer_reviews.title: Great set!!!
customer_reviews.text: One night, and I’m sold! This is the best comforter set for the price that I have ever ordered. So soft and cozy!! I ordered another for my teenager and am planning on ordering this for my tween also. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl L. Forbush

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This bedding is so soft, easy to wash and is true to its size. What you receive for your money is amazing! It’s such a beautiful navy blue and could be matched with any other offset color for the perfect look. The comforter is lightweight and easy to care for.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Urbick

customer_reviews.title: good value considering price
customer_reviews.text: Overall we are satisfied with this set for our guest room. The sheets are very light weight and feel thin, but they are also soft. They've withstood about 3 washes so far and are not yet showing any problems. The comforter is also somewhat thin, but has been okay for our guests in the winter in New England. Not the highest quality bedding set, but a good value for what we paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Sara E.

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Quite durable and warm. Like the feel of this material
customer_reviews.author: oz

customer_reviews.title: Glorious purple color
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my brother and sister-in-law. They were very happy with the comfort and color of this product. It looked so gorgeous on their bed!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Becker

customer_reviews.title: Other than the huge color difference, it’s a nice set.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set and wanted another one so I clicked buy again so I knew it was the same one. When I got the second one it was not even close to the same color. The first was was very dark green, and the second one is very light green. I wanted the same colors because I wanted to have a spare set and have extra pillows, but I can’t because they’re not even close to the same color z
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Zepp-Fickus

customer_reviews.title: Slow shipping and comes compressed
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if I’m going to return this item yet at first glance it comes compressed in a plastic bag this compression caught me off guard and I have preconceived ideas of how warm this blanket is already I’ll sleep with it tonight but if it doesn’t keep me warm it’s going back
customer_reviews.author: Glen Andrew Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality , love the color . It didnt have the texture of the stripes as deltailed as the photo like i thought it would be. But still really like it .
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Benedict

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit a 12" thick matress
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't quite fit the 12" matress I got. I thought the 12" of height on the fitted sheet meant that it would, but it does not. Live and learn I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Duckworth

customer_reviews.title: Love this set so much!!
customer_reviews.text: Super impressed with the quality and comfort of this set. I bought thinking it would be a extra set for the guest room and now everyone wants this set for their bed! Very comfortable and very soft!!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Powers

customer_reviews.title: Nice, lasting product
customer_reviews.text: Nice product and has lasted me a long time now. Great value for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Skiba

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set
customer_reviews.text: The comforter is very soft & comfortable. I have not used the sheets yet due to getting other ones. The only issue I have is that the color was lighter than what the picture showed. The comforter is very nice but I was expecting a darker gray color.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Everything great except bed skirt
customer_reviews.text: Be careful with the bed skirt, it's very thin, so it tears easily. Otherwise great product and the rest of the bedding is great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Issue with the size of the comforter
customer_reviews.text: I liked my comforter set. I would've rated it higher if, the comforter was larger. My queen size comforter didn't cover my queen size mattress. The edges of the comforter barely reaches the base of the mattress on 3 sides. This leaves approxamently 8"-10" of the mattress uncovered at the head of the bed. If the sheets didn't match the comforter, it would really be noticeable. I feel this is tacky. I feel all manufacturer's need to address this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Nice comfort and style for the price
customer_reviews.text: The only disappointment was the color is not as deep green as shown in the picture. It is a light sage green instead. I purchased this set to match the curtains that I have in my bedroom. I was having a trunk filling party for my granddaughter who was leaving for college. I had my bedroom door open for guest to use my bathroom because it was a large crowd and wanted a fresh new look. The fit, size, and feel of this set are well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis E. Baaith

customer_reviews.title: 👌
customer_reviews.text: So far I’ve only been laying on top of the blanket because it’s too hot right now to use it, but it definitely already makes my bed much softer! I did see a few loose strings on the blanket when I took it out of the bag, though
customer_reviews.author: Kaycee

customer_reviews.title: Get quality bedding for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Love this set transformed my bedroom into a beautiful hotel looking suite, I received lots of compliments on it at my house warming party. Comforter is very warm if you a cold natured person wont need and additional blankets sometimes to warm. Sheets are soft and warm also good for the winter months. I wiil purchase more products from this supplier.
customer_reviews.author: Tan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome comfort. One bed sheet was small. Efficient material
customer_reviews.text: The package was well. I got the queen size. I love the color. When it came to the bed sheet it was small for a full size bed. I even got a size big. The material seems very fresh. I find it perfect for a south state like Florida. It is perfect for the night time after a warm day. I love the style to the top sheet. I am a big fan of the square design. I find it to be a comfort. Awesome product. Just one error of the bed sheet to be small.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Silva

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We are so pleased with this comforter set. Its beautiful, well made and looks very expensive. Best purchase I've made for a comforter set.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie and Tim Kite

customer_reviews.title: Warm, soft, comfortable and cozy
customer_reviews.text: This thing really keeps you warm in the winter. Maybe too hot to cover with in summer. I've had it for over 6 months now. Washed it and still in good condition. Good quality for price
customer_reviews.author: Kay-Regular shopper at Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and good quality.
customer_reviews.text: We like it. It’s light enough to have in the summer with AC and warm enough for the winter nights. We have washed it a few times already and it’s holding up well. I think it will last long because the quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Irfan Meah

customer_reviews.title: Color is way off from picture
customer_reviews.text: The sizing was fine for me, queen fit nicely and it arrived sooner then excepted which was great. But the “Dobby beige” is definitely plain tan. The online pics look light like an ivory but it’s tan and even says “tan” on the receipt. Disappointed in the color. The stripes also go the wrong way, horizontal across bed instead of vertical. Would not buy again. Updated with one less star because we returned and they took out 20% for a “reprocessing” fee. Terrible return policy
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: Mold and Dirt on Comforter!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this comforter set for my apartment and was extremely disappointed with this purchase. The package smelled awful when I first opened it and when I unfolded the sheets, I saw that the comforter was covered with patches of mold and had dirt all over it. There were many more patches that are not photographed (I couldn't take the smell of it any longer). It was very disgusting and I do not recommend purchasing this item.
customer_reviews.author: jade

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful workmanship
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful workmanship. Transformed my bedroom. So very warm and light. Easy to keep bed made up Excellent value
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Mclaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Nice bedding,fits as should comforter heavy.
customer_reviews.text: Soft,no oder at all.Needed a new comforter so sheets and pillow cases will be used later in week with new bed.will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: CJracing

customer_reviews.title: Soft. Warm. Decorative.
customer_reviews.text: This product is very nice. From the design to the comfortable fabric, I absolutely recommend it! The comforter itself is about medium weight...not too heavy but not thin and light either. Perfect, I suppose. The two sheets are also very comfortable and I’ve washed them a few times they’re very durable. No coloration loss or dye residue on my other clothes. Packaging was very nice as well. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: BeardedMan

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: The comforter is a little on the thin side for me (but I get cold easily!) Otherwise, I think it's a good deal. Very nice looking and comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Bed skirt was ruined by washing it once despite following the care instructions on the label. Color is not as pictured. Much much lighter and the pattern is not visible like in the pictures. Won't buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Kile

customer_reviews.title: Deep Navy and Beautiful Pattern.
customer_reviews.text: This comforter set has a beautiful subtle pattern. It is deep navy in color and a good weight. Not to heavy.
customer_reviews.author: STF

customer_reviews.title: Nice and soft comforter!😊
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this comforter..It's so soft..We got a queen it's fine..If you have a bed topper I would go up a size..But other then that it's a nice comforter..The pink so pretty. I would definitely get this again
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette

customer_reviews.title: not worth it. Doesn't look good. Can find better
customer_reviews.text: this is not a bedcover but if you need something cheap to place in between your nice cover and your sheet but you can get better deal.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy but dull color.
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, the sheets feel amazing!! Secondly, the color is not as bright red as the picture portrays. I am disappointed in the dull muted burgundy color, looks like it's been washed for years. Also some of the stitching on the quilted comforter are sketchy looking. I decided to keep it because I hate returning things and because the sheets are so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Scribner

customer_reviews.title: Eight piece comforter set.
customer_reviews.text: The set is a decent value. The problem I had with the lower cover sheet should not have happened. I washed it as instructed and it failed terribly. I also had problems with UPS not leaving it on the porch and then it took two more days to leave it at the specified site. When I got it the package appeared to have gone through a war. I was not at all happy with UPS. I never had such an issue with a delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy.....very hot
customer_reviews.text: Need a steamer to get out all the wrinkles. Lots of work to make it presentable. Would like it to have been a little larger. Will work temporarily till I find something else. The cat likes to sleep on it.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I previously read the reviews on this item they were not good at all but after buying the item I’m very happy I did it’s very pretty aesthetically nice on the eyes and I would order them again.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie O

product_meta.title: Sweet Home Collection 6 Piece Bed in a Bag with Dobby Stripe Comforter, Sheet Skirt, and Sham Set, Twin, White, 6
product_meta.description: Size:Twin| Color:Dobby WhiteSpruce up your bedroom with our 6 piece hotel style dobby vine embossed down alternative microfiber bed in a bag comforter, sheet, bed skirt, pillowcase, sham set. The classic baffle-box design with double-needle stitching prevents Blanket filling from shifting and bunching. Set includes Comforter, bed skirt, fitted sheet, flat sheet, 1 pillow case, 1 pillow sham
feature_bullets: Smooth, piped edging with double-needle stitching
Sewn-through construction eliminates shifting for evenly distributed warmth
Set includes Comforter, bed skirt, fitted sheet, flat sheet, 1 pillow case, 1 pillow sham
Twin: comforter: 66"X 88",Bed skirt: 39"X 76"+ 14" , flat sheet: 66"X 96",Fitted sheet: 39"X 75"+12", pillowsham: 20"X 26" +2, Pillowcase: 20"X 30"

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars3,033 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
